description.english: Destroy 4 buildings and build 1 building in 10 seconds with your team
description.german: Zerstöre mit deinem Team 4 Gebäude und errichte 1 Gebäude in 10 Sekunden
description.french: Détruisez 4 bâtiments et construisez-en 1 en moins de 10 secondes avec votre équipe
description.italian: Con la tua squadra, distruggi 4 edifici e costruiscine 1 in 10 secondi
description.koreana: 지배 팀으로 10초 내에 건물 4개를 파괴하고 건물 1개를 지으세요
description.spanish: Destruye 4 edificios y construye 1 edificio en 10 segundos con tu equipo.
description.schinese: 掌控局势 与你的队友在10秒内摧毁4栋建筑并建造1栋建筑
description.russian: Разрушьте 4 здания и постройте 1 здание за 10 секунд своей командой
description.japanese: 支配力 10秒以内に建物を4つ破壊し、建物を1つ建築する
description.portuguese: Destrua 4 construções e erga 1 construção em 10 segundos com a sua equipe

description.english: Destroy 5 buildings in 5 seconds with your player
description.german: Zerstöre mit deinem Charakter 5 Gebäude in 5 Sekunden
description.french: Détruisez 5 bâtiments en moins de 5 secondes avec votre joueur
description.italian: Distruggi 5 edifici in 5 secondi con il tuo personaggio
description.spanish: Destruye 5 edificios en 5 segundos con tu jugador.
description.schinese: 闪电攻击 在5秒内摧毁5栋建筑
description.russian: Разрушьте 5 зданий за 5 секунд своим игроком
description.japanese: 狂暴になれ 5秒以内に5つの建物を破壊する
description.portuguese: Destrua 5 construções em 5 segundos com o seu personagem

description.english: Kill 4 players with your player without dying
description.german: Töte mit deinem Charakter 4 Spieler ohne zu sterben
description.french: Tuez 4 joueurs sans mourir avec le vôtre
description.italian: Uccidi 4 giocatori con il tuo personaggio senza morire
description.spanish: Elimina a 4 jugadores con tu jugador sin morir.
description.russian: Убейте 4 игроков своим игроком, не умерев.
description.japanese: 一度も倒されないで、4人のプレイヤーを倒す。
description.portuguese: Mate 4 jogadores com o seu personagem sem ser abatido

description.english: Kill 2 players with your player in 5 seconds
description.german: Töte mit deinem Charakter 2 Spieler in 5 Sekunden
description.french: Tuez 2 joueurs en moins de 5 secondes avec le vôtre
description.italian: Uccidi due giocatori in 5 secondi
description.spanish: Elimina a 2 jugadores con tu jugador en 5 segundos.
description.russian: Убейте 2 игроков своим игроком за 5 секунд
description.japanese: 5秒以内に2人のプレイヤーを倒す
description.portuguese: Mate 2 jogadores com o seu personagem em 5 segundos

description.english: Kill 3 players with your player in 10 seconds
description.german: Töte mit deinem Charakter 3 Spieler in 10 Sekunden
description.french: Tuez 3 joueurs en moins de 10 secondes avec le vôtre
description.italian: Uccidi 3 giocatori in 10 secondi
description.spanish: Elimina a 3 jugadores con tu jugador en 10 segundos.
description.russian: Убейте 3 игроков своим игроком за 10 секунд
description.japanese: 10秒以内に3人のプレイヤーを倒す
description.portuguese: Mate 3 jogadores com o seu personagem em 10 segundos

description.english: Build 5 buildings in 3 seconds
description.german: Errichte 5 Gebäude in 5 Sekunden
description.french: Construisez 5 bâtiments en moins de 3 secondes
description.italian: Erigi 5 edifici in 3 secondi
description.spanish: Construye 5 edificios en 3 segundos.
description.japanese: 3秒以内に建物を5つ建築する
description.portuguese: Erga 5 construções em 3 segundos

description.english: 80 aliens killed by anyone in 8 seconds
description.german: Insgesamt 80 Käfer werden in 8 Sekunden getötet
description.french: 80 insectes tués en moins de 8 secondes, tous joueurs confondus
description.italian: 80 alieni sterminati da chiunque in 8 secondi
description.spanish: 80 alienígenas eliminados por cualquiera en 8 segundos.
description.schinese: 任意玩家在8秒内消灭80个外星生物
description.japanese: 8秒以内に誰かがエイリアンを80体倒す
description.portuguese: 80 alienígenas mortos por qualquer um em 8 segundos

description.english: 6 buildings destroyed by anyone in 5 seconds
description.german: Insgesamt 6 Gebäude werden in 5 Sekunden zerstört
description.french: 6 bâtiments détruits en moins de 5 secondes, tous joueurs confondus
description.italian: 6 edifici distrutti da chiunque in 5 secondi
description.spanish: 6 edificios destruidos por cualquiera en 5 segundos.
description.schinese: 任意玩家在5秒内摧毁6栋建筑

description.english: 12 buildings destroyed by anyone in 10 seconds

description.spanish: 12 edificios destruidos por cualquiera en 10 segundos.
description.schinese: 任意玩家在10秒内摧毁12栋建筑

description.english: 55 marines killed by anyone in 3 seconds
description.german: Insgesamt 55 Marines werden in 3 Sekunden getötet

description.english: 55 marines and 1 building destroyed by anyone in 6 seconds
description.german: Insgesamt 55 Marines und 1 Gebäude werden in 6 Sekunden vernichtet
description.french: 55 marines tués et 1 bâtiment détruit en moins de 6 secondes, tous joueurs confondus
description.italian: 55 marine e 1 edificio distrutti da chiunque in 6 secondi
description.koreana: 아무나 6초 내에 해병대 55명 학살 및 건물 1개 파괴

description.schinese: 任意玩家在6秒内消灭55个海军陆战队士兵并摧毁1栋建筑

description.spanish: 4 marines aplastados por el derrumbe de un edificio.
